name: Pokebase
short: Your personal Pokédex to get info on a lot of Pokémon related stuff.
description: Fetch various info about a Pokémon and some fun commands.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
install_msg:
Hi, thanks for installing Pokebase cog. Hope you will find it useful.
Feel free to check the docs <https://readdocs.voltrabot.com/docs/Cogs/pokebase>
